short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically fills in the username field across pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a convenient tool that automatically fills in the username on specific websites during the login process.

It saves the username entered on the first login page.
On the second page, it auto-fills the saved username and clicks the "Next" button, streamlining the login process for a faster and more efficient experience.
The extension includes a toggle button in the settings to enable or disable the functionality as needed.
Key Features:
Automatic username saving and input
Automated login steps
Intuitive popup UI for easy control
Notes: This extension only works on the specified URLs, and the stored data is safely kept in the local storage of your browser.
